ImageName.description: The name of the image this version belongs to.
ImageName.markdownDescription:
The name of the image this version belongs to.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 63  
Pattern: ^[A-Za-z0-9]([-.]?[A-Za-z0-9])*$  
Update requires: No interruption

ImageArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the parent image.
ImageArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the parent image.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^arn:aws(-[\w]+)*:sagemaker:[a-z0-9\-]*:[0-9]{12}:image\/[a-zA-Z0-9]([-.]?[a-zA-Z0-9])*$  
Update requires: No interruption

ImageVersionArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the image version.
ImageVersionArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the image version.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^arn:aws(-[\w]+)*:sagemaker:[a-z0-9\-]*:[0-9]{12}:image-version\/[a-zA-Z0-9]([-.]?[a-zA-Z0-9])*\/[0-9]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

BaseImage.description: The registry path of the container image on which this image version is based.
BaseImage.markdownDescription:
The registry path of the container image on which this image version is based.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 255  
Pattern: .+  
Update requires: No interruption

ContainerImage.description: The registry path of the container image that contains this image version.
ContainerImage.markdownDescription:
The registry path of the container image that contains this image version.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 255  
Pattern: .+  
Update requires: No interruption

Alias.description: The alias of the image version.
Alias.markdownDescription:
The alias of the image version.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: (?!^[.-])^([a-zA-Z0-9-_.]+)$  
Update requires: No interruption

Aliases.description: List of aliases for the image version.
Aliases.markdownDescription:
List of aliases for the image version.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Version.description: The version number of the image version.
Version.markdownDescription:
The version number of the image version.

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

VendorGuidance.description: The availability of the image version specified by the maintainer.
VendorGuidance.markdownDescription:
The availability of the image version specified by the maintainer.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: NOT_PROVIDED | STABLE | TO_BE_ARCHIVED | ARCHIVED  
Update requires: No interruption

JobType.markdownDescription:
Indicates SageMaker job type compatibility.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: TRAINING | INFERENCE | NOTEBOOK_KERNEL  
Update requires: No interruption

MLFramework.description: The machine learning framework vended in the image version.
MLFramework.markdownDescription:
The machine learning framework vended in the image version.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z]+ ?\d+\.\d+(\.\d+)?$  
Update requires: No interruption

ProgrammingLang.description: The supported programming language and its version.
ProgrammingLang.markdownDescription:
The supported programming language and its version.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z]+ ?\d+\.\d+(\.\d+)?$  
Update requires: No interruption

Processor.markdownDescription:
Indicates CPU or GPU compatibility.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: CPU | GPU  
Update requires: No interruption

Horovod.markdownDescription:
Indicates Horovod compatibility.

---

Required: No  
Type: Boolean  
Update requires: No interruption

ReleaseNotes.description: The maintainer description of the image version.
ReleaseNotes.markdownDescription:
The maintainer description of the image version.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 255  
Pattern: .*  
Update requires: No interruption
